txt.en: 'On our way here from the Rotting Cellar, we saw much of the fungus in the Water-works. We need to take swift action to ensure that we are not overwhelmed, and also, we must ensure that the Orcs do not maintain even a small foothold by our water-wheels.\n\n'Speak with the others and do what you can to help them out with their plans. Meanwhile, I have another request of you.'

'I thank you for helping them all with their plans. I am sure some did more than others, but they have all proved valuable.\n\n'I believe we are getting close to figuring out how to stop this foul fungus.'
'Speak with the others. They have good ideas... but more importantly, they are interested in staying and fighting this accursed affliction.'
The dwarves of Hulwul-nefekh have many thoughts and ideas about how to best combat the fungus.
Ansurr and the other dwarves are at Hulwul-nefekh in central Water-works.\n\nAnsurr has asked you to assist the other dwarves with their ideas about how to defend against the vile growth.
Ansurr is in Hulwul-nefekh in central Water-works.\n\nYou should return to Ansurr and inform him you have aided his companions with their ideas.
